name: Birdies
description:
Sonic!! No. Flash? No. Another stupid flying turtle game? Hey the game wasn't stupid but no!

This game is all about control, you thought it was easy to fly as a bird? You were wrong. This game truly tests your manoeuvring skills, good timing and speed. Put your fingers to the test or be a lazy guy and use a controller(don't use on(it's much harder(trust me(please)))) in a game where SPEED IS KEEEY!!! Customise your bird to look emo dark or angel white, your choice, I already made some ducks and what not.. But never mind that!! *Update* I made the bird go even faster. cool. My friends played this and raged because they don't have the true potential to be a bird. Do you have what it takes? Try now. (actually paying for this game is really nice and helps me in real life) Thank you.

Gamejolt - http://gamejolt.com/games/birdies/84784
